title.narrative: Africa Programme for Peace-Phase IV, engagement

sector.narrative: Civilian peace-building, conflict prevention and resolution

Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Convention to Combat Desertification
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Adaptation
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Mitigation
Reproductive, Maternal, Newborn and Child Health (RMNCH)

title.narrative: Regional strategic guidance and protocol on mediation rolled out and implemented

description.narrative: 1. Number of countries supported to develop conflict resolution and mediation strategies in line with IGAD Strategic Guidance and Protocol on Mediation 2. Number of national institutions of IGAD Member States trained and coordinating with MSU

title.narrative: Regional strategic guidance and protocol on mediation rolled out and implemented

description.narrative: 1. Number of countries supported to develop conflict resolution and mediation strategies in line with IGAD Strategic Guidance and Protocol on Mediation 2. Number of national institutions of IGAD Member States trained and coordinating with MSU

comment.narrative: 1. No IGAD MS align conflict resolution and mediation instruments with IGAD Strategic Guidance and Protocol on mediation 2. Follow up implementation of peace agreements, mediation and national reconciliations are ongoing in Somalia and South Sudan but not anchored in IGAD Strategic Guidance and Protocol on Mediation.

title.narrative: IGAD Governance, Democracy and Elections Protocol adopted by member states

description.narrative: 1. Adoption of IGAD Governance, Democracy and Elections Protocol by IGAD policy organs 2. Number of Member States who develop action plan for implementation of IGAD Governance, Democracy and Elections Protocol

title.narrative: IGAD Governance, Democracy and Elections Protocol adopted by member states

description.narrative: 1. Adoption of IGAD Governance, Democracy and Elections Protocol by IGAD policy organs 2. Number of Member States who develop action plan for implementation of IGAD Governance, Democracy and Elections Protocol

comment.narrative: Draft protocol exists but not ratified by IGAD Member States

title.narrative: IGAD’s normative and institutional capacity in preventive diplomacy, mediation and peace building to manage and resolve conflicts enhanced.

description.narrative: 1. IGAD Provides leadership in mediation, conflict resolution and implementation of peace agreements in the region in line with IGAD Strategic guidance and protocol on mediation 2. Number of deployment of IGAD Mediators and Technical Experts in IGAD led mediation and early response initiatives (disaggregated by deployment type)

title.narrative: IGAD’s normative and institutional capacity in preventive diplomacy, mediation and peace building to manage and resolve conflicts enhanced.

description.narrative: 1. IGAD Provides leadership in mediation, conflict resolution and implementation of peace agreements in the region in line with IGAD Strategic guidance and protocol on mediation 2. Number of deployment of IGAD Mediators and Technical Experts in IGAD led mediation and early response initiatives (disaggregated by deployment type)

comment.narrative: 1. Mediation and conflict resolution efforts are reactive and lack synergy with other IGAD programmes. IGAD Strategic Guidance on mediation adopted in 2017, IGAD Protocol on Mediation not in place 2. IGAD Roster of Mediators available but not yet deployed in mediation and conflict resolution activities, IGAD Roster of Technical Experts on mediation not in place

title.narrative: Enhanced capacity of IGAD to effectively deploy and conduct preventive diplomacy and mediation

description.narrative: 1. Number of IGAD Mediators and Technical Experts trained and readily available for deployment 2. Degree of intra and inter IGAD cooperation on mediation established and formalized through MoUs

title.narrative: Enhanced capacity of IGAD to effectively deploy and conduct preventive diplomacy and mediation

description.narrative: 1. Number of IGAD Mediators and Technical Experts trained and readily available for deployment 2. Degree of intra and inter IGAD cooperation on mediation established and formalized through MoUs

comment.narrative: 1. IGAD Roster of Mediators available but not yet deployed in mediation and conflict resolution activities, IGAD Roster of Technical Experts on mediation not in place 2. Linkages and collaboration between MSU and other IGAD offices and AU are undertaken on ad hoc basis

title.narrative: Strengthened processes in IGAD member states in democracy, governance and electoral systems

description.narrative: 1. Number of IGAD Member States who adopt IGAD Governance, Democracy and Election Protocol 2. Number of election observation missions deployed in the region (disaggregated by type of missions / joint mission with AU and other RECs, Short term mission and long term mission) 3. Status of establishment of an IGAD mechanism for promoting good governance.

title.narrative: Strengthened processes in IGAD member states in democracy, governance and electoral systems

description.narrative: 1. Number of IGAD Member States who adopt IGAD Governance, Democracy and Election Protocol 2. Number of election observation missions deployed in the region (disaggregated by type of missions / joint mission with AU and other RECs, Short term mission and long term mission) 3. Status of establishment of an IGAD mechanism for promoting good governance.

comment.narrative: 1. IGAD Governance, Democracy and Election Protocol not adopted by member states 2. IGAD deploys short-term missions to observe elections in member states 3. No coordinated mechanism for supporting MSs Election Management Bodies (EMBs)

title.narrative: Mechanism to enhance election observation and follow-up implementation of election recommendations developed and validated by member states

description.narrative: 1. Number of election observers trained and readily available for deployment (disaggregated by gender and country) 2. Operationalization of a mechanism to follow up implementation of election observations recommendations

title.narrative: Mechanism to enhance election observation and follow-up implementation of election recommendations developed and validated by member states

description.narrative: 1. Number of election observers trained and readily available for deployment (disaggregated by gender and country) 2. Operationalization of a mechanism to follow up implementation of election observations recommendations

comment.narrative: 1. No election observers roster 2. No follow up mechanism on the implementation of recommendations from election observations. Capacity building for Election Management Bodies provided on ad hoc basis

description.narrative: Number of institutions that become part of the IGAD governance Platform (disaggregated by Member State and type of institutions)
Number of institutions that become part of the IGAD governance Platform (disaggregated by Member State and type of institutions)

comment.narrative: All Member States’ institutions become part of the governance platform
